title: Airplane!
description: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.

directors.name: Jim Abrahams
directors.biography: Jim Abrahams was born in Shorewood, Wisconsin.

directors.name: David Zucker
directors.biography: David Zucker was born on October 16, 1947 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

directors.name: Jerry Zucker
directors.biography: Jerry Zucker was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

directors.name: Martin Scorsese
directors.biography: Martin Charles Scorsese was born in Queens, New York City.

title: Goodwill Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

directors.name: Gus Van Sant
directors.biography: Gus Green Van Sant Jr. is an American filmmaker from Louisville, Kentucky.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
description: Harry Potter is tasked with the dangerous and seemingly impossible task of locating and destroying Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes.

directors.name: David Yates
directors.biography: David Yates is best known for directing the final four Harry Potter films.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
description: As the battle between the forces of good and evil in the wizarding world escalates, Harry Potter draws ever closer to his final confrontation with Voldemort.

directors.name: David Yates
directors.biography: David Yates is best known for directing the final four Harry Potter films.

title: Shawshank Redemption
description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

directors.name: Frank Darabont
directors.biography: Frank Darabont was born in a refugee camp in 1959 in Montbeliard, France.

title: Silence of the Lambs
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

directors.name: Jonathan Demme
directors.biography: Jonathan Demme was born in Long Island, New York.

title: Step Brothers
description: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

directors.name: Adam McKay
directors.biography: Adam McKay is an American screenwriter, director, comedian, and actor.

title: The Sandlot
description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures, including the recovery of a baseball signed by Babe Ruth.

directors.name: David Mickey Evans
directors.biography: David Mickey Evans was born in Wilkes Barre, Pennsylvania.

title: The Town
description: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold the manager hostage. Things get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with her.

directors.name: Ben Affleck
directors.biography: Benjamin Affleck was born in Berkeley, California.
